alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 04 at 8:57PM EDT until October 07 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Fisheating Creek near Palmdale affecting Glades County. For the Lake Okeechobee/Fisheating Creek...including Ortona Lock, 12 midnight avg lake lvl, Moore Haven Lock, Fisheating Creek near Lakeport at Highway 78, Clewiston Ind. Canal, Palmdale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fisheating Creek near Palmdale. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Fisheating creek is coming out of flood stage. Access road to campground and the bath house are still Flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM EDT Wednesday was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.1 feet on 10/17/1938. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Fisheating Creek Palmdale 7.0 7.1 Wed 8 pm EDT 7.1 7.0 6.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1100 AM EDT.
